snippet: In New York, developers and retailers on Roosevelt Island plan to get more residents to shop closer to home by adding shops to its Main Street corridor.
abstract: New York developers and retailers on Roosevelt Island plan to get more residents to shop closer to home by adding storefronts to its Main Street corridor. Photos (M)
lead_paragraph: Where do Roosevelt Islanders shop? Not on Roosevelt Island -- at least, not if they can help it. Residents do just 12 percent of their shopping on the island, according to a survey by the Roosevelt Island Operating Corporation two-and-a-half years ago.

headline.main: New Lures Promised for Shoppers on an Urban Island
